div.h3: Reviews created for v_mahajanp for sprint Gortahork 4
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-4546:Refactor Eligibility Result DTO & Listview as a part of FAB-4609

FAB-5277: DB changes to add new Subset to TimeUnits Enum Domain
FAB-5383: Add new Enum Domain \'MinimumTime\' along with the Domain Instances for A06-F02
FAB-5286: Correct the Eligibility-Criteria-Type for MinEE and Minimum No Of Employees rules.
FAB-5421 : Add Validation Rules and Validators for Minimum Time and minimum Time Increment Fields on Leave Plan Availability Tab
FAB-5358 : UI Changes
FAB-5403:Refactor for Eligibility Criteria Type as part of Eligibility Improvement
FAB-5374:Refactor Leave Plan Availability tab as a part of A06-FO2 Minimum Time Increment
FAB-5488: Update the enums/EvidenceResultType.java
FAB-5488: Update the instance value to Not Satisfied
FAB-5403:Refactor Length of service Plan Rule name as part of Eligibility Improvement
FAB-5511: Corrected expression for EvidenceReceipt, EvidenceResultType, TimeDecisionReason
FAB-5288 : DB changes to remove MinimumPayableAmount, LeaveTimeMinimumAmount and LeaveTimeMinimumAmountBasis attributes from LeavePlanPaidLeave entity
FAB-5285 : Changes to remove minimumPayableAmount, leaveTimeMinimumAmount and leaveTimeMinimumAmountBasis fields from leavePlanPaidLeave along with all Validators
FAB-5374:Refactor Leave Plan Availability tab for Failed Test
FAB-5374:Refactor Paid Leave Management Tab for Leave Plan as a part of A06-F02
FAB-5545: Update the OverrideRuleEligibilityResultType to include Not Known and Partially Met.
FAB-1987:Nightly Failed,Refactor Eligibility Rules on wrap up screen
FAB-1987:Nightly Failed,Refactor Minimum Time Increment in Leave plan Availability
FAB-5599: The headers are corrected as needed.
FAB-5571 : Create a Absence Case Java Rule method to check if the pending Leave Request has any Evidence Result with Evidence Receipt status as Pending
FAB-5403:Refactor for Eligibility List View, Icon Column Removed.
